name: Spikehead

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in the Arena by 30%.

skills.name: Stomp
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%

skills.name: Battle Cry
skills.raw_description:
Places a 15% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Rip
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Has an extra 20% chance of inflicting a critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
